Removed Answers, Added Lectures

Removed Answers, Added Lectures
Removed Answers, Added Lectures
Added Mass Lecture Adding, Implemented a unit method to find the most recent (active) lecture.
Answering screen now shows one question at a time.
CSS and JS is now loaded with Elixir
Made answer page more mobile friendly.
Added primitive dragula interface for lecture questions.
Added basic analytics, basic answer-to-value calculation.
Added attribute name to lectures, SQL queries are now used to find a unit's active lecture.
Added attribute name to lectures, SQL queries are now used to find a unit's active lecture.
Added attribute name to lectures, SQL queries are now used to find a unit's active lecture.
Added smiley slider.
Smiley slider now properly works as an answer type.
Made smiley slider presentable, Added question type preview when creating a new question.
Added dark bootstrap theme.
New question average algorithm, Can have >1 type 1 questions in one lecture. Added final screen before submiting answers
Smiley slider option disabled if 1 active exists, Added edit function to lectures and questions, Added favicon.
Added morris.js
Added lectures-marks graphs for every unit at Analytics.
Children and grandchildren are now properly removed.
Added Authorization.
Added logo to navbar.
Added % of students graph, Added form validation.
